meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hotheaded.
meanings.sent1: His hotheadedness often leads to arguments with others.
meanings.sent2: Her hotheadedness caused her to make hasty decisions.
meanings.sent3: His hotheadedness made him challenge a squirrel to a staring contest.
meanings.sent4: The hotheadedness of the situation boiled over into a heated debate.
meanings.sent5: The hotheadedness of the chef was evident in the fiery spices he used.

meanings.definition: A tendency to act impulsively or irrationally.
meanings.sent1: The hotheadedness of the child led him to jump into the puddle without thinking.
meanings.sent2: Her hotheadedness often got her into trouble at school.
meanings.sent3: The hotheadedness of the situation resulted in a spontaneous dance party.
meanings.sent4: His hotheadedness was like a storm, sudden and intense.
meanings.sent5: The hotheadedness of the driver caused him to honk angrily at every red light.
